name: Everpad Integration
description:
Integration Everpad (https://github.com/nvbn/everpad) with gnome-shell.


Panel icon:
- Place your mouse over the icon to see the menu.
- Left-click on the icon opens Everpad.
- Click on the icon with the mouse wheel - sync.
- Right-click opens Everpad Snippets with the latest notes.
Snippets:
- Move the cursor to the right of the screen to see your pinned notes.
- Start typing to search for notes, <Esc> to exit the search.
- Place your mouse over the date to see the time of last modification.
- Left-click on the snippet opens the note to Everpad.
- Right-click copy the share URL (if any) to the clipboard.
